title_en: MetaHGNIE: Meta-Path Induced Hypergraph Contrastive Learning in Heterogeneous Knowledge Graphs
title_zh: MetaHGNIE：异构知识图谱中基于元路径的超图对比学习框架
summary_en: Node importance estimation (NIE) in heterogeneous knowledge graphs is a critical yet challenging task, essential for applications such as recommendation, knowledge reasoning, and question answering. Existing methods often rely on pairwise connections, neglecting high-order dependencies among multiple entities and relations, and they treat structural and semantic signals independently, hindering effective cross-modal integration. To address these challenges, we propose MetaHGNIE, a meta-path induced hypergraph contrastive learning framework for disentangling and aligning structural and semantic information. MetaHGNIE constructs a higher-order knowledge graph via meta-path sequences, where typed hyperedges capture multi-entity relational contexts. Structural dependencies are aggregated with local attention, while semantic representations are encoded through a hypergraph transformer equipped with sparse chunking to reduce redundancy. Finally, a multimodal fusion module integrates structural and semantic embeddings under contrastive learning with auxiliary supervision, ensuring robust cross-modal alignment. Extensive experiments on benchmark NIE datasets demonstrate that MetaHGNIE consistently outperforms state-of-the-art baselines. These results highlight the effectiveness of explicitly modeling higher-order interactions and cross-modal alignment in heterogeneous knowledge graphs. Our code is available at https://github.com/SEU-WENJIA/DualHNIE
summary_zh: 异构知识图谱中的节点重要性评估是一项关键且具有挑战性的任务，对于推荐、知识推理和问答等应用至关重要。现有方法通常依赖于成对连接，忽略了多实体与关系之间的高阶依赖，并且将结构信号与语义信号独立处理，阻碍了有效的跨模态融合。为解决这些挑战，我们提出了MetaHGNIE，一种基于元路径的超图对比学习框架，用于解耦并对齐结构与语义信息。MetaHGNIE通过元路径序列构建高阶知识图谱，其中类型化的超边捕获多实体关系上下文。结构依赖通过局部注意力机制进行聚合，而语义表示则通过配备稀疏分块技术的超图变换器进行编码以减少冗余。最后，一个多模态融合模块在对比学习与辅助监督下整合结构与语义嵌入，确保鲁棒的跨模态对齐。在多个节点重要性评估基准数据集上的大量实验表明，MetaHGNIE始终优于现有先进基线方法。这些结果凸显了在异构知识图谱中显式建模高阶交互与跨模态对齐的有效性。我们的代码公开于：https://github.com/SEU-WENJIA/DualHNIE
